welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.subtitle: We're glad you're part of our community.
welcome.subtitle2: Before we begin, we need some information to set up your account and offer you the best possible experience.

infoForm.title: Fill in your personal information
infoForm.subtitle: Fill in these fields so you can begin your experience on the platform.

changePassword.title: Protect your account
changePassword.subtitle: Set a strong password to keep your information protected.
changePassword.helperText: Your password must be at least 8 characters long, including one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.

securityTab.passwordMakeChange: Make this user change their password the first time they sign up

notificationsTab.requestPermission: We need your browser's permission to show notifications. Request permission

securityUpdates.secondary: Important notifications about the security of your account.
Important notifications about the security of your account.

errors.permissions: You do not have permission for this operation

changePasswordRequire: Make this user change their password when they log in for the first time.

devices.title: Login History
devices.aboutCloseSection: You will be logged out in a maximum of 2 hours, during which time you may still be logged in.
